trans-unit.source: Using the BizTalk XPath Extractor in logic apps in Azure App Service | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Using the BizTalk XPath Extractor in logic apps in Azure App Service | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: BizTalk XPath Extractor
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XPath Extractor

trans-unit.source: BizTalk XPath Extractor
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XPath Extractor

trans-unit.source: BizTalk XPath Extract connector helps your app lookup and extract data from XML content based on a given XPath.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XPath Extract connector helps your app lookup and extract data from XML content based on a given XPath.

trans-unit.source: Using the BizTalk Xpath Extractor
trans-unit.target: Using the BizTalk Xpath Extractor

trans-unit.source: To use the BizTalk Xpath Extractor, you need to first create an instance of the BizTalk Xpath Extractor API app.
trans-unit.target: To use the BizTalk Xpath Extractor, you need to first create an instance of the BizTalk Xpath Extractor API app.

trans-unit.source: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the BizTalk Xpath Extractor API app from the Azure Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: This can be done either inline while creating a logic app or by selecting the BizTalk Xpath Extractor API app from the Azure Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] There are no configuration settings associated with BizTalk Xpath Extractor.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] There are no configuration settings associated with BizTalk Xpath Extractor.

trans-unit.source: [Create a new logic app].
trans-unit.target: [Create a new logic app].

trans-unit.source: Open “Triggers and Actions” within your Logic App to open the Logic Apps Designer to configure your flow.
trans-unit.target: Open “Triggers and Actions” within your Logic App to open the Logic Apps Designer to configure your flow.

trans-unit.source: On designer, the right pane lists the API Apps available to build your flow.
trans-unit.target: On designer, the right pane lists the API Apps available to build your flow.

trans-unit.source: Find the "BizTalk XPath Extractor".
trans-unit.target: Find the "BizTalk XPath Extractor".

trans-unit.source: Selecting it adds the Xpath Extractor to your flow and provisions an instance of it.
trans-unit.target: Selecting it adds the Xpath Extractor to your flow and provisions an instance of it.

trans-unit.source: Once provisioned, the designer shows up the action associated with BizTalk XPath Extractor API App:
trans-unit.target: Once provisioned, the designer shows up the action associated with BizTalk XPath Extractor API App:

trans-unit.source: BizTalk XPath Extractor Choose Action
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XPath Extractor Choose Action

trans-unit.source: Choose "Extract Using XPath".
trans-unit.target: Choose "Extract Using XPath".

trans-unit.source: "Extract Using XPath" evaluates input xpath expression on a given input XML:
trans-unit.target: "Extract Using XPath" evaluates input xpath expression on a given input XML:

trans-unit.source: BizTalk XPath Extractor Input
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XPath Extractor Input

trans-unit.source: Parameter|Type|Description of the parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter|Type|Description of the parameter

trans-unit.source: XPath|string|Query path inside xml.
trans-unit.target: XPath|string|Query path inside xml.

trans-unit.source: Input Xml|string|Input Xml content.
trans-unit.target: Input Xml|string|Input Xml content.

trans-unit.source: The action returns the output as a string - Result.
trans-unit.target: The action returns the output as a string - Result.

trans-unit.source: Result contains the value of query path inside the XML.
trans-unit.target: Result contains the value of query path inside the XML.
